title: Rek'Sai bug STILL NOT FIXED?
body:
For the love of god hurry up and fix the bug when Rek'Sai gets stunned in burrow form... IT'S BEEN THERE SINCE RELEASE, COME ON RIOT!

(When stunned in burrow form after the cc is done you can't do anything for another couple seconds which virtually doubles the length of most stuns)

replies.body:
leave it 

rek sai is a hoe
another thing is if your silenced you cant unburrow making you unable to auto attack. probably not a bug but i really fkn hate it
BUMP BECAUSE GET THIS SORTED RIOT
Yeah noticed this lol your spells go greyed out even after the stuns finished aye?
